equation:
\begin{equation}
\begin{array}{lll}
K_{z {\bar z} z {\bar z}} =  -4 M + 8 M' X  
\ , \\ 
\quad \\
K_{a {\bar a} a {\bar a}} = 
M'' + X M'''  - X \frac { {M''}^2}{ M'}  \ , 
\\
\quad \\
K_{z {\bar z} a {\bar a}} =  
2 M' + 2 X M''  - 2X \frac { {M'}^2}{ M} \ . 
\end{array}
\label{4fermicouplings}
\

\begin{equation} 
g^2 M_0 = m_W^2, \hspace{2 em} M_0^{\prime} = \frac{\mu^2}{m_W^2}, 
\hspace{2 em} X_0 = \frac{m_A^2 m_W^2}{2 g^2 \mu^2}, 
\hspace{2 em} M_0^{\prime\prime} = \frac{g^2 \mu^4}{m_A^2 m_W^6}\, 
 \left( m_h^2 - m_A^2 \right).
\label{5.9}
\

\begin{equation}
b\cal L}_{ferm} = - {\bar\Psi}  \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial\hspace{-1.1ex}/} Psi 
 - {\bar\Phi}  \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial\hspace{-1.1ex}/} Phi 
 - {\bar\lambda}^+_L  \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial\hspace{-1.1ex}/} lambda^-_L
 + 2g \sqrt{2M_0}\, {\bar\Psi} Psi + 2g\sqrt{2X_0 M^{\prime}_0}\, {\bar\Phi} Phi.
\label{5.15}
\

\begin{equation}
\begin{array}{lll} 
G_{z{\bar z},z{\bar z}} & = & \hspace{-.5 em} \displaystyle{ \frac{1}{(1 + {\bar z} z)^{4}}  \left[ -2 + 4 {\bar z} z 
 + 4 (1 + {\bar z} z)^2 X K_m^{\prime} + ( 8 + 64 {\bar z} z + 68 ({\bar z} z)^2 ) X^2 
 K_m^{\prime\prime} \right. }\\
 & & \\
 & & \hspace{-.5 em} \displaystyle{ \left. +\, 16 {\bar z} z (2 + 5 {\bar z} z) X^3 K_m^{\prime\prime\prime} + 
 16 ({\bar z} z)^2 X^4 K_m^{\prime\prime\prime\prime} \right] }\\
 & & \\
G_{z{\bar z},a{\bar z}} & = & \hspace{-.5 em} \displaystyle{ G_{a{\bar z},z{\bar z}}\, =\, [ G_{z{\bar z},z{\bar a}} ]^*\, =\, 
 [ G_{z{\bar a},z{\bar z}} ]^* }\\
 & & \\
 & = & \hspace{-.5 em} \displaystyle{ \frac{4{\bar a} z}{(1+{\bar z} z)} \left[ 
 (1 + {\bar z} z) K_m^{\prime} + (5 + 11 {\bar z} z) X K_m^{\prime\prime}  
 + (2 + 11 {\bar z} z) X^2 K_m^{\prime\prime\prime} \right. }\\
 & & \\
 & &
